name: EART 104
title: Geologic Hazards
description: The recognition, evaluation, and mitigation of geologic hazards: earthquakes and faulting, tsunamis, volcanism, landslides and mass movements, and flooding.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements, and EART 10 and EART 10L; or EART 5 and 5L; or EART 20 and EART 20L.

class_notes: Prerequisites: satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements, and course 10/L or 5/L or 20/L
